DOC.brief_summary: Context : Soluble CD40 ligand ( sCD40L ) release activated platelet induce inflammatory transformation vascular endothelium independent predictor cardiovascular event . Arterial hypertension associate platelet activation , increase sCD40L level endothelial dysfunction suggest inhibition platelet-derived sCD40L release may improve endothelial function lower blood pressure ( BP ) . Objective : To determine effect clopidogrel sCD40L , endothelial function BP . Design : Randomized , control , investigator-blinded , parallel-group , 2-phase trial patient coronary artery disease essential arterial hypertension without hypertension . Intervention : Participants receive single 600-mg clopidogrel load dose ( phase I ) follow daily 75-mg clopidogrel maintenance dose 28 day ( phase II ) . Outcome Measures : Primary outcome measure change BP baseline . Secondary outcome measure change biomarkers platelet endothelial function correlation BP .
